description.name: Aspose.Total Project Wizard - Eclipse Update Site

site.description: "New Aspose project" which creates a new Eclipse project by downloading and referencing libraries of Aspose Java APIs. The Aspose project wizard allow user to select products from Aspose Java product lines like Aspose.Words Once specific product is selected its reference is automatically downloaded Downloaded APIs are automatically referenced in classpath of the project. If there is newer version available, User is notified while creating project and release notes are displayed
